title: Privacy Policy Summary
content: TechPro is committed to protecting your privacy. We collect personal information including name, email, shipping address, and payment details necessary to process orders. This information is stored securely and never sold to third parties. We use cookies to improve website experience and track analytics. You can opt out of marketing emails at any time. Data is stored on secure servers with encryption. We comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations. You can request a copy of your data or account deletion by contacting privacy@techpro.com. We retain order history for 7 years for accounting and warranty purposes. Your payment information is processed through PCI-compliant payment processors and not stored on our servers. We may share necessary information with shipping carriers to deliver orders. Device data like IP address and browser type is collected for fraud prevention and security. Third-party analytics services (Google Analytics) may collect usage data. All employees are trained on privacy policies and have signed confidentiality agreements.

title: Warranty and Support Policy
content: All TechPro products include a manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Standard warranty is 1 year from purchase date, with premium products including extended coverage (2-3 years). Warranty covers hardware failures including display defects, battery issues, charging problems, and component failures. Software issues are typically resolved through updates and are not warranty claims. Warranty does NOT cover physical damage, liquid damage, unauthorized repairs, cosmetic wear, or normal battery degradation. To claim warranty service, contact support with proof of purchase and description of issue. Diagnostic steps may be required. Approved claims receive repair or replacement at our discretion. Advance replacement is available for select products - replacement ships before you return defective unit (hold on credit card). Returned products must include all original accessories. Turnaround time for warranty repairs is typically 5-10 business days. Extended warranty plans are available at purchase covering accidental damage and extending coverage period. Refurbished products carry 90-day warranty. Warranty is void if serial number is removed or altered.

title: Shipping and Delivery Policy
content: TechPro offers multiple shipping options to meet your needs. Standard shipping (5-7 business days) is free on orders over $500, otherwise $7.99 flat rate. Expedited shipping (2-3 business days) costs $15.99. Overnight shipping costs $29.99. Orders placed before 2PM EST ship same business day, after 2PM ship next business day. We do not ship on weekends or holidays. Shipping addresses must be valid physical addresses - we cannot ship to PO boxes for large items. Signature may be required for high-value orders over $1000. If you're not available, carrier will leave a delivery notice with redelivery or pickup instructions. Shipping insurance is included on all orders. Report lost or damaged shipments within 48 hours. Large items (TVs, furniture) ship via freight with delivery appointment. Delivery team will bring item inside and remove packaging. International shipping available to select countries with longer delivery times and potential customs fees (customer responsibility). Orders cannot be rerouted once shipped. Address changes must be made before shipping.

title: Return and Refund Policy
content: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Most products can be returned within 30 days of delivery for full refund. Items must be in original condition with all accessories, cables, manuals, and packaging. Opened software, used personal items (earbuds, headphones), and custom-configured products are not returnable unless defective. To start a return, contact support with order number. You'll receive return authorization (RMA) number and shipping label if applicable. Defective or damaged items: TechPro pays return shipping. Change of mind: customer pays return shipping. Package items securely in original box when possible. Refunds process within 5-7 business days after return is received and inspected. Refund goes to original payment method. Return shipping costs are not refunded unless item was defective. Refused deliveries are treated as returns (customer pays return shipping fees). Restocking fee of 15% applies to opened non-defective returns of large items (TVs, monitors). Holiday purchases have extended return window - check seasonal policies. Items purchased with promotional discounts may be refunded at the promotional price paid.

title: Price Match Guarantee
content: TechPro offers a price match guarantee to ensure you get the best value. If you find a lower price on an identical product from an authorized retailer, we'll match it. Price match requests must be made before purchase or within 14 days of delivery. Provide URL or advertisement showing lower price. Price match applies to base product price only, excluding shipping, taxes, or promotional bundles. Competitor must be authorized retailer (not marketplace sellers or auction sites). Product must be in stock at competitor. Prices must be verifiable and available to general public. We reserve the right to verify pricing and limit quantities. Price match does not apply to Black Friday, Cyber Monday, or limited-time flash sales. Pricing errors by competitors are not eligible. Refurbished prices cannot be matched against new product pricing. Price adjustments are provided as refund to original payment method or account credit. Cannot be combined with other discounts unless stated. Contact sales team with price match requests including all relevant information.

title: Product Availability and Backorders
content: We make every effort to ensure product availability but high-demand items may go out of stock. Website inventory is updated in real-time but brief delays may occur during high traffic. If an item becomes unavailable after you order, we'll notify you within 24 hours with options to wait for restock, choose alternative product, or cancel for full refund. Estimated restock dates are provided when available but are not guaranteed. You can sign up for back-in-stock notifications on product pages. Backorder items can be pre-ordered at current price with charge processed when item ships. Pre-orders ship in order received when stock arrives. You can cancel backorders anytime before shipping. Bundle deals requiring multiple products will not ship until all items are in stock unless you request partial shipment. Some products are made-to-order with longer lead times shown on product page. Limited edition and seasonal items may not be restocked. Authorized retailers may have different inventory levels - contact them directly for availability. Gray market and unauthorized sellers are not affiliated with TechPro and may sell counterfeit products.
